grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 雷【カミナリ】lightning, thunder, thunderbolt, god of thunder, god of lightning, anger, fit of anger

日雷【ひがみなり】thunder on a clear day, lightning that starts a fire
